thread.section_title: Bundle Stars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bundle Stars | www.bundlestars.com | 6 of 907
thread.title: DaRabidDuckie

author: DaRabidDuckie
title: DaRabidDuckie
text: Bundles are plentiful and cheap, with fast key delivery. The bundles aren't always the greatest with the frequency of them I usually end up getting 2-3 a month. I really wish there was a way to mark whether a key has been redeemed and check which keys haven't yet been redeemed (or some sort of contact if a key has been added). I buy a lot of bundles and it's nice to have some form of tracking to see which keys I have left for trading or if new keys were added. This is the only thing preventing them from getting a 5-star review
